title: WANTED: T206 front and back combinations
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: T206 front and back combinations
posts.post_content:
Hi :)

I am looking to add a few T206 to my collection:

Fred Clark (bat) ......  Sovereign 150

Hughie Jennings (two hands/ dancing) ..... American Beauty 460 .... OR A DRUM!!!:D

Orval Overall (portrait) .... El Principe De Gales

I do not care about the technical grade of the cards, only a respectable eye appeal. Basically, no beaters, but all other examples are just fine.

If you have any that you are willing to part with, please feel free to send me a PM and I would love to discuss a potential deal. Cash, Trade .... whatever.

Thank You Very Much.

Derek

bump ... especially for the jennings!

thanks :)
